name: Purchase Resources
brief: Purchase resources with gold based on commerce structure tier
description: Use the kingdom's treasury to acquire needed materials through your commerce infrastructure. Better commerce structures provide better trade rates. Requires at least one commerce structure (Market Square, Bazaar, Merchant Guild, or Imperial Bank).

criticalSuccess.description: Use trade rate one tier higher than your commerce structure (e.g., Market Square → Bazaar rate). Imperial Bank achieves legendary 1:3 rate (1 gold → 3 resources)!

success.description: Use your current commerce structure's trade rate (Market Square: 2:1, Bazaar: 3:2, Merchant Guild: 1:1, Imperial Bank: 1:2)

special: Purchase a single resource type with gold. Amounts must be divisible by your trade ratio (e.g., with 3:2 rate, buy in sets of 2 resources for 3 gold). Commerce tier determines rate: T1 Market Square (2:1) → T2 Bazaar (3:2) → T3 Merchant Guild (1:1) → T4 Imperial Bank (1:2) → Bonus Tier (1:3, critical success only)
